intervals.description: Replace engine oil and oil filter. Warm engine first for complete drain.
intervals.torque_spec: Drain plug: 18 lb-ft (25 Nm), Oil filter cover: 7 lb-ft (9 Nm)
intervals.fluid_spec: 5W-40 BMW Advantec Ultimate — 4.0L with filter change

intervals.description: Check and adjust intake and exhaust valve clearances on both cylinders. ShiftCam engines require specific procedure.
Drain and replace engine coolant. Bleed air from system after refill.
Replace spark plugs on both cylinders. Check electrode condition before install.
Replace air filter element. Inspect more frequently when riding in dusty/off-road conditions.
Replace shaft drive final drive gear oil. Check for leaks at drive shaft boot.
intervals.torque_spec: Drain plug: 18 lb-ft (25 Nm), Fill plug: 18 lb-ft (25 Nm)

intervals.description: Replace front and rear brake fluid including ABS system. Use DOT 4 per BMW spec.
Check front and rear brake pad thickness. Replace when wear indicator is reached.
Inspect Telelever front and Paralever rear suspension bearings and joints for play or wear.
Check battery voltage and charging system. BMW uses CAN-bus battery management. Minimum resting voltage: 12.6V.
